summary: Phyllis Dorothy James, Baroness James of Holland Park, OBE, FRSA, FRSL  was an English writer of crime fiction.
full_text: Phyllis Dorothy James, Baroness James of Holland Park, OBE, FRSA, FRSL , known as P. D. James, was an English crime writer. She rose to fame for her series of detective novels starring police commander and poet Adam Dalgliesh.
title: P. D. James
